mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.book_name AS "bookName", a.author AS "author", a.cover AS "cover", a.first_class AS "firstClass", a.second_class AS "secondClass", a.price AS "price", a.by_link AS "byLink", a.is_recommend AS "isRecommend", a.publish_date AS "publishDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM book_manager a
AND a.book_name LIKE '%'||#{bookName}||'%' '%'+#{bookName}+'%' concat('%',#{bookName},'%')
AND a.author LIKE '%'||#{author}||'%' '%'+#{author}+'%' concat('%',#{author},'%')
AND a.first_class LIKE '%'||#{firstClass}||'%' '%'+#{firstClass}+'%' concat('%',#{firstClass},'%')
AND a.second_class LIKE '%'||#{secondClass}||'%' '%'+#{secondClass}+'%' concat('%',#{secondClass},'%')
AND a.price BETWEEN #{beginPrice} AND #{endPrice}
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_manager( id, book_name, author, cover, first_class, second_class, price, by_link, is_recommend, publish_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{bookName}, #{author}, #{cover}, #{firstClass}, #{secondClass}, #{price}, #{byLink}, #{isRecommend}, #{publishDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE book_manager SET book_name = #{bookName}, author = #{author}, cover = #{cover}, first_class = #{firstClass}, second_class = #{secondClass}, price = #{price}, by_link = #{byLink}, is_recommend = #{isRecommend}, publish_date = #{publishDate} WHERE id = #{id}
